title: Latest updates: East Midlands Live Monday 18 September 2017 - BBC News
summary: four boys held in leicester murder probe .
lord nelson letters to be auctioned in derbyshire .
nottingham car park demolition started by poetry winner .
'sus device ' found in loughborough was replica grenade .

documents.title: leicester city 2-0 liverpool
text: leicester city 2-0 liverpool
author: Alex Bysouth
BBC Sport

documents.title: gray 'close to new leicester deal '
text: gray 'close to new leicester deal '

documents.title: three boys charged in murder inquiry
text: three boys charged in murder inquiry

documents.title: our live coverage has ended
text: regular live coverage on this page has ended for the day , but breaking news , sport and travel updates will continue appear through the night .
east midlands live returns from 08:00 tomorrow morning .

documents.title: lib dem boss reveals childhood sniper practice
text: the leader of the liberal democrats has told bbc radio leicester the naughtiest thing he 's ever done was shooting an air rifle out of his window while pretending to be a sniper .
vince cable said : `` an episode occurred in my childhood when i discovered an air riffle in my dad 's wardrobe and i brought round a friend and we discovered how it worked .
i started practicing being a war time sniper against my neighbour 's windows .
`` eventually it was reported and a policemen duly appeared on my doorstep and i was marched off to the police station and i got a bit of a dressing down , nothing more . ''
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: regional mayor talks collapse
text: talks to create an elected metro mayor for sheffield - to include parts of north nottinghamshire and derbyshire - have collapsed .

the meeting of south yorkshire councils in rotherham earlier failed to reach any agreement on the stalled process to give sheffield , south yorkshire and parts of derbyshire and nottinghamshire similar devolved powers to manchester and the west midlands .
the plan appears to be in severe doubt after doncaster and barnsley again said they favoured a pan-yorkshire proposal .
the government said it was `` very disappointing '' adding that it put £ 1bn of investment in jeopardy .
author: Press Association

documents.title: bye , bye broadmarsh ( car park and bus station )
text: demolition of nottingham 's broadmarsh car park and bus station began earlier today .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: rugby : tigers coach leaving
text: richard blaze has resigned from his position as leicester tigers forwards coach for personal reasons .
he joined tigers as a second-row forward in 2007 before moving into coaching .
head coach matt o'connor has said : we 're sorry to lose him and we wish him well for the future . ''
author: BBC Leicester Sport

documents.title: two men jailed in connection with more than 50 burglaries
text: two men from leicester have been jailed for a total of 13 years after admitting a series of more than 50 burglaries across seven counties , including suffolk and norfolk .
lee heane , 27 , left , of radford drive and matthew bryan , 25 , of glenhills boulevard were sentenced at ipswich crown court for seven years and six years respectively .
the burglaries took place between november 2016 and february 2017 .
the locations in the east of england were :
thousands of pounds-worth of jewellery and a large quantity of cash were stolen during the burglaries , as well as three shotguns and cartridges from the hadleigh property .

documents.title: solidarity run organised after recent attacks
text: joggers in derby are being encouraged to run in groups or join running clubs after a number of attacks in recent months .
mickleover running club organised a solidarity run yesterday close to where a female runner was robbed .
she was punched to the ground and kicked , before a small amount of money was stolen earlier this month .
the club hopes the attacks wo n't stop people running .
about 40 people took part in the run which started in the meadows area .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: two arrested in murder investigation
text: two arrested in murder investigation

documents.title: robber threatened shop staff with knife
text: police have released this cctv image of a man they want to speak to following an armed robbery in derby .
a man went into select convenience in the riverlights around 4.40 today and pretended to be a member of staff .
he threatened two workers with a knife and took money from the till before leaving .
he then walked along morledge pulling a small wheeled suitcase .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: in limbo silva returns to portugal
text: in limbo silva returns to portugal

documents.title: 'spinning van ' killed crash survivors
text: 'spinning van ' killed crash survivors

documents.title: man found dead in chesterfield formally identified
text: the body of a man found at a house in chesterfield has been formally identified as 32-year-old leon pirdue .
he was found by paramedics at a house in chiltern close yesterday morning .
a 25-year-old woman and 32-year-old man have been arrested on sus of mr pirdue 's murder and remain in police custody .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: east midlands weather update : cloudy with clear spells
text: showery rain will clear in the first half of tonight , but afterwards it will be cloudy with occasional clear spells and lows of7c ( 45f ) .
patches of mist or fog are likely to develop in the early hours of tomorrow and these may linger for some time in the morning .
after these have cleared , there 'll be variable amounts of cloud with some bright spells and highs of 17c ( 63f ) .
author: Alexandra Hamilton
BBC weather presenter

documents.title: crash survivors 'killed by spinning van '
text: a young couple who survived crashing their car on a flooded road were killed by a van after they got out of their vehicle , an inquest heard .

shabhaz bhim and his fiance shana sutaria , both from leicester , survived the initial crash on the a46 near widmerpool but were then hit by a van which was `` spinning and rolling '' on the flooded road .
the crash happened in december 2015 when they were returning home in `` horrendous '' weather conditions .
at the hearing , the van driver joe dennis described the water on the road as `` like hitting a lake '' .
during the five-day inquest highways england will be questioned regarding the maintenance of the road .
the inquest , at nottingham coroners ' court , is due to last all week .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: huge increase in burglaries in 'golden triangle '
text: crimestoppers is launching a new campaign in loughborough to get more people to share information about burglaries or anyone dealing in stolen property .
the charity claims there was more than a 100 % increase in burglaries in the `` golden triangle '' area in the last four months of the year between 2014 and 2016 .
this is the area that 's especially popular for student accommodation .
the campaign is focusing on the hashtags # dontletthemin and # leaveyourlightson on facebook , instagram and twitter .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: your questions : lakes not as deep as expected
text: earlier i answered one of your questions about the depth of the lakes at sence valley forest park .
the man behind the question has since got back in touch with a response to my answer .
`` thanks so much for delving 'deep ' into the answer bank and coming up with a result for my 'in depth ' question , you really seem to have 'plumbed the depths ' of local knowledge .
`` i must say i was surprised that the lakes are really quite shallow considering the size of the quarry and the amount that was extracted .
i was expecting them to be a lot deeper than they actually are .
just goes to show that things are n't always as they seem but even though i now know the real depth i still wo n't be going for a snorkel to see what 's lurking in the gloom . ''
if you have a question you 'd like us to answer please get in touch here .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: bus passenger racially abused
text: a woman has reported being racially abused by two drunk men on a bus travelling from alfreton to derby .
the men got on the 9.3 bus on friday 4 august at ripley market place at about 22:50 .
it 's claimed they sat near a 27-year-old woman and made comments directed to her before getting off at prospect street in alfreton .
police are asking for anyone who recognises the men in this cctv image to get in touch with them .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: four boys held in murder inquiry
text: four boys held in murder inquiry

documents.title: broken nose and eye socket in littleover attack
text: do you recognise this man ?
police want to speak to him about an assault outside a pub in littleover .
it happened around 01:00 on sunday 4 june near to the white swan on shepherd street .
a 33-year-old man suffered a broken nose and eye socket in a disturbance involving a group of men .
police have arrested a 21-year-old man and a 22-year-old man in connection with the attack .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: torvill and dean 'should be knighted '
text: a campaign has been launched for nottingham 's ice skating legends jayne torvill and christopher dean to be knighted .
nottingham south mp lilian greenwood has put in an application to the cabinet office , which decides each year who to recommend for the honour .
ms greenwood is asking people to write letters of support to her constituency office .

she said : `` jayne torvill and christopher dean are two of our city 's most outstanding sporting heroes and of course they have done a great deal for the city and charities over the years and they should be recognised .
`` people in nottingham are really proud of them . ''
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: vehicles parked near roadworks causing delays
text: bus operator nottingham city transport ( nct ) says vehicles parked near roadworks in the city centre are causing delays .
nct said there are currently delays of up to 30 minutes `` because of the reduced traffic flow through the city centre '' .
a spokesman for siemens said : `` we have been alerted and are on the case . ''
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: police name biker who died in crash
text: a man who died after a crash between a motorcycle and a car has been named as dean blower .
the 21-year-old , from wallet street in netherfield , died at the scene after the crash in freeth street at about 21:00 on saturday , nottinghamshire police said .
a 44-year-old man , who was arrested on sus of causing death by dangerous driving , has now been released under investigation .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: firefighters to stop acting as emergency first responders
text: derbyshire 's chief fire officer has expressed his disappointment that firefighters will no longer act as emergency first responders .
a nationwide trial saw fire officers trained to give medical help if they arrived at an incident before the ambulance service .
however , that has been stopped due to a pay dispute between the fire brigades union ( fbu ) and the government .
terry mcdermott said : `` the fact is , if we are not getting there as quickly as the ambulance service and every second counts , then potentially yes , lives could be lost . ''
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: seabirds rescued in nottingham
text: two seabirds have been found in nottingham - 80 miles away from their usual home on the coast .
these manx shearwaters were found uninjured in dunkirk and mapperley park .
it is thought they had become exhausted as a result of being blown off course .
they have been transferred to the rspca 's stapeley grange wildlife centre in cheshire , where they will undergo rehabilitation before being released back into the wild .
the rspca says it has taken in almost 300 manx shearwaters across the uk following storms and high winds .
the islands of skomer and skokholm , in wales , have about 50 % of the uk 's manx shearwater population .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: cancer toddler receives hundreds of hearts on facebook
text: more than 400 people have got in touch on our facebook page to send dawson willcock hearts for his birthday .
the toddler turns two on wednesday .
his mum , wendy , has saved all the hearts and birthday cards to open on dawson 's birthday .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: sledgehammer blow marks start of broadmarsh car park demolition
text: the demolition of the broadmarsh car park has begun .
bulwell resident joy rice kicked off the demolition - after winning a council-run competition to strike the first sledgehammer blow .
her poem about the car park ensured she would be the first person to start the work .
here it is for you to enjoy
joy 's poem :
i am the right person to swing a sledgehammer at broadmarsh car park because it would be my one and only chance to make my civic mark ,
to go down in history as the demolisher of this nottingham landmark ,
a task to get rid of this graceless monument , i would gladly embark ,
people would cheer me on !
`` knock it down '' , they would remark ,
i 'd swing that sledgehammer through the air in a wide arc ,
i wonder if there 'd be splinters or maybe even a spark ,
goodbye !
farewell !
good riddance to broadmarsh car park !
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: police 'will not make further inquiries ' into replica grenade find
text: leicestershire police has said there will be no further inquiries into the discovery of a replica grenade in loughborough last night .
a spokeswoman told the bbc : `` it was examined last night and it is believed it had been outside for a while as it had a weathered look .
`` in light of that , i do n't believe we are making any further inquiries . ''
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: murder probe man named by police
text: a man who died after being found injured on king street in leicester earlier this month has been named as john donovan .
mr donovan , 64 , from newtown street , was taken to hospital on 2 september , however police say they were not informed of this until 12 september .
mr donovan died three days later on friday .
four boys - three aged 14 and one aged 15 - arrested on sus of mr donovan 's murder remain in police custody .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: your questions : how deep are the lakes at sence valley forest park ?
text: in the north west of leicestershire is sence valley forest park - a peaceful place to go dog walking or fishing .
some people may remember the park used to be something very different .
between 1982 and 1996 , it was a coal mine where eight million tons of coal was extracted .
when the mine closed , a third of the land was obtained by leicestershire county council , who now lease it to the forestry commission .
it was turned into a forest park and four lakes were created : horseshoe lake , stonebridge pool , goss water and usbourne pool .
using your questions , stephen jardine got in touch to ask : how deep are the lakes at sence valley forest park ?
i 've been to meet area forester alan dowell to find out
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: macfarlane acquires packaging distributor
text: macfarlane acquires packaging distributor

documents.title: breakingmurder arrests after chesterfield death
text: police have arrested two people on sus of murder following the discovery of a body at a house in chesterfield .
a 25-year-old woman and 32-year-old man remain in custody and are being questioned .
paramedics found the body of a man in his 30s at a house in chiltern close yesterday morning .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: your comments : matlock bath illuminations
text: have you been to see the matlock bath illuminations yet ?
it 's running every weekend until saturday 28 october at derwent gardens .
the event has so far received mixed responses on facebook .
richard mozzy moo morrison said : `` always used to go with the kids until they started charging an entrance fee . ''
pat lilley said : `` looks fantastic .
might even get to see them . ''
david staley said : `` what a great effort by all involved . ''
author: Facebook

documents.title: your comments : praise for factory death fall mum
text: the mother of adam johnson , who died after falling from the roof of a derelict building in the chester green area of derby , has received messages of praise for speaking out about her loss .
marie webster said : `` what an incredibly strong and inspirational lady .
rip adam . ''
betty smith said : `` what a lovely mum you are .
so sorry at your loss . ''
wendy mccartney said : `` one marvellous mum who spoke highly of her dear son adam . ''
author: Facebook

documents.title: 'sus device ' was fake grenade
text: police have confirmed the `` sus device '' found in loughborough last night was a replica grenade .
it 's not known yet if it was put there maliciously .
people living on garendon road had to be evacuated from their homes while explosive ordinance disposal examined the item outside epinal way ambulance station .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: cars , bikes and bollards 'yarn-bombed ' for charity
text: bollards , benches , shops and even cars and bikes were `` yarn-bombed '' at the weekend .
members from the southwell yarn bomb project spent months making decorative pieces for the town .
on saturday , they covered southwell and raised £ 1,000 for the alzheimer 's society and the young archaeologists ' club .
town councillor sue rodgers , who runs the project , cared for her father who had dementia until 2014 .
mrs rodgers said : `` what began as a small personal project was quickly embraced by the residents of southwell and taken to a whole new level .
`` the whole community has got involved , from primary school children to care home residents - this really is a cross-generational project . ''
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: children continue to 'explore ' derelict building
text: a few days after a 12-year-old boy fell to his death from the roof of the former aida bliss building in chester green , police have said young people are still going inside the derelict factory .
aida engineering limited has said it has 24-hour security but police said young people are still finding a way inside to `` explore '' .
one local resident told the bbc : `` the kids have been coming in and out for years - it 's a playground for them .
`` they were in there the next day after the accident .
we could hear them in there . ''
insp jim allan said that derelict buildings `` attract young people '' and it 's the forces ' job to ensure children `` see the risk '' .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: fuchs recovering from eye injury
text: craig shakespeare has said he 's hopeful that christian fuchs can return to train with his team-mates this week .
the leicester city defender did n't feature in the 1-1 draw away at huddersfield on saturday , as he recovers from a freak eye injury he up in training .
the foxes boss said they 're waiting for his vision to fully clear up before allowing him back out with the rest of the squad .
author: BBC Leicester Sport

documents.title: crash victim cut from vehicle
text: the fire service has cut a person free from a car that crashed on wilmot street in heanor .
police and the ambulance service have also been on the scene while the road was closed and the person was treated by medical staff .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: northants aim to make notts 'twitchy '
text: northants aim to make notts 'twitchy '

documents.title: crashed sports car driver 'lucky '
text: it 's remarkable that the driver of this toyota mr2 was virtually unharmed .
it ended up wrapped around a lamp post after the driver hit standing water on the a50 in derbyshire .
derbyshire police said the driver was lucky to escape with minor injuries .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: ryanair cancels flights after 'messing up ' pilot holidays
text: fortunately , no flights have been affected at east midlands airport by ryanair 's holiday blunder - yet .
the airline admitted it had messed up the planning of its pilots ' leave and will have to cancel between 40 and 50 flights every day until the end of october , affecting about 300,000 customers .
ryanair says affected customers with bookings up to this wednesday have been informed but beyond this , it remains unclear which flights will be axed over the next six weeks .
kenny jacobs from ryanair said : `` we have messed up in the planning of pilot holidays and we 're working hard to fix that . ''
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: poetry contest winner to start car park demolition
text: a competition winner from bulwell will take a sledgehammer to the broadmarsh car park to start its demolition .
joy rice won a poetry competition run by nottingham city council .
joy said : it is just a horrible ugly building .
i used to work opposite it in the late 1980s and early 1970s and it was horrible and it has been ever since . ''
the car park and bus station closed in july as part of a £ 250m investment to redevelop the area .
demolition will take about six months and a new bus station and car park will be built next year .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: 'sus device ' found in loughborough
text: some people living in loughborough were evacuated from their homes last night after a `` sus device '' was found outside an ambulance station .
police and the explosive ordinance disposal were called to epinal way just after 18:40 - the road was then closed while the device was examined .
it was found to be `` inert and safe '' and people living on garendon road , behind the station , were allowed to return home .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: rams suffer heavy defeat
text: derby county need to themselves up after losing 4-1 at bristol city over the weekend .
manager gary rowett said there could be big changes before the game against birmingham city next saturday .
in the women 's northern premier division , derby county were also beaten by huddersfield 1-0 .
author: BBC Derby Sport

documents.title: train carriage dedicated to ww1 rail staff
text: a restored victorian train carriage has been dedicated to the memory of rail staff who served in world war one .
the 1888 carriage - the oldest owned by the great central railway nottingham heritage group - has been brought back to its former glory over 16 years .
more than 10,000 gcr staff - a third of the total - served in the armed forces and more than 1,300 were killed .
plaques will be fitted to the carriage , which will have a permanent home at a museum being built near leicester .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: runners turn out for attack victims
text: runners turn out for attack victims

documents.title: watch : east midlands weather forecast
text: here 's how the weather is shaping up this monday morning .
author: Rich Davis
BBC Weather presenter

documents.title: school closed after fire destroys old leisure centre
text: newark academy will be closed today after a fire which destroyed a nearby former leisure centre .
about 50 firefighters were called to the grove leisure centre in balderton on friday evening .
although the school - which is next to the centre - has n't been damaged , it will stay closed to allow site safety work .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: travel : updates from across the region
text: travel : updates from across the region
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live

documents.title: boys arrested in murder investigation
text: four teenagers have been arrested on sus of murdering a man in his 60s .
the man was injured on 2 september in the king street area of leicester - but police were only made aware of it on tuesday last week .
the man then died on friday morning .
police have said a post-mortem examination has been carried out and enquiries are continuing into the cause of death .
three 14-year-old boys and a 15-year-old boy are in police custody .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: mp quits twitter over election campaign abuse
text: a bbc survey of mps has found the overwhelming majority received some form of abuse - verbal , online , physical or damage to property - during the 2017 general election campaign .
of the 113 mps who responded to the survey , 87 % said they had suffered some form of abuse .
ben bradley , mansfield 's first conservative mp , said he has stopped using twitter because of abuse and increased security at his home .
author: BBC Radio 5 live

documents.title: body found in chesterfield house
text: police are investigating the death of a man in chesterfield after a body was found at a house in chiltern close yesterday .
he was found by paramedics who then called the police just after 07:00 .
officers would like to hear from anyone who saw or heard anything sus at the house .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: join us for our live coverage
text: good morning nottinghamshire , derbyshire and leicestershire .
amy woodfield and i will be writing the updates on today 's live page with all the latest news , sport , weather and travel .
if you 'd like to get in touch with us , you can send an email , or use facebook or twitter .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC Local Live
